title: (3885-519) Esmoriz - 1371 Avenida 29 de Março
description: Excellent self service laundry. Ample parking just opposite. Very clean and friendly staff who know English. Good prices. With less than 10 euros I washed and dried 15kg worth of clothes. The place has FREE WiFi. They even have a change machine in case you run out of coins.

title: (3885-580) Esmoriz - 553 Rua Gaspar Corte Real
description:
Car park next to an entrance to the walkways in Barrinha de Esmoriz.
Long walkways with beautiful views over the lagoon and down to the sea.
Rest areas with benches.
No support services.
Quiet, close to housing.
We only stopped for lunch and to do the trails of the bar.

title: (3885-436) Esmoriz - 46 Rua dos Castanheiros
description: self car wash. Height restriction to 3.50m. Still feasible with a length of 6.50 m. With coins (4 euros should be enough)

title: (3885-462) Esmoriz - Rua da Ilha
description: Terminal behind the Esmoriz Intermarché with all the free services. Thanks to the Intermarché which often have things for camper

title: (3885-464) Esmoriz - 512 Rua da Indústria
description:
Quiet intermarket car park.
Stand along the road to the left of the intermarché so as not to hear the road on the other side.
Free service air just behind with space to park (be careful because delivery area can be bright early in the morning)
Everything is done to refuel and rest for a night before Porto.

title: (3885) Esmoriz - 1 Avenida das Relvas
description: Very good place. Is quiet and free park from the Junta de Freguesia.

title: (3885) Esmoriz - 64 Praça João Santarém
description: Only for parking

title: (3885) - Rua da Floresta
description: Quiet place surrounded by forest near the beach.

title: (3885-415) Esmoriz - 89 Avenida Joaquim Oliveira e Silva
title_short: (3885-415) Esmoriz - 89 Avenida Joaquim Oliveira e Silva
description: Perfect laundry room with three different size washers and three dryers.

name: Parque de Campismo de Esmoriz
title: (3885-529) Parque de Campismo de Esmoriz
description: Campsite with the flair of a refugee camp. With a view of gas tanks, high fences, a road and sad broken caravans. Overall very sad.

address.street: Rua Clube de Campismo do Porto

title: (3885-415) Esmoriz - 1525 Avenida Doutor Fernando Raimundo Rodrigues
title_short: (3885-415) Esmoriz - 1525 Avenida Doutor Fernando Raimundo Rodrigues
description: Parking by the sea in moriz. Shops, cafes / restaurants and a small supermarket are within walking distance. No toilet disposal for campers available. Toilets and cold and warm free showers available, are completed around 8pm and open at 9am again. the warm showers are in a white turquoise round building next to the driveway to the parking lot.

title: (3885-414) Esmoriz - 222 Avenida Infante Dom Henrique
description: Fantastic parking lot right next to the beach. Gravel and plenty of space with showers and public toilets available

title: (3885-627) Esmoriz - 440 Rua Vasco da Gama
description: Medium park, near the sea, easy access and safe place.  No camper support

title: (3885) Esmoriz - Rua Diogo Cão
description: Small parking by the sea, very quiet, no services

title: (4500-558) Paramos - 49 Rua da Praia
description: Parking for one night or more facing the calm ocean. A bar next door.

title: (3885-312) Cortegaça - 355 Rua Frederico Ulrich
description: Facing the ocean, no services but perfect to spend one or more nights! Surfers will love the area! We sleep with the sound of the waves! A few bars at 500 m. Some cars stop but nothing disturbing. A super spot!

title: (4500) Espinho - Rua da Praia
description: Locations on an old airstrip at the military base. No prohibition so far, a very little road runs along the track. No services, but there is the ocean crossing the road, large waves insured.

title: (3885) Cortegaça - Rua das Campanhas
description: Quiet place by the ocean.

title: (3885-231) Cortegaça - 140 Rua Bartolomeu de Gusmão
description: Quiet parking with motorhomes and van Camper, mount, sea, bar from 10 h. Beach showers and clean toilet in the bar.

title: (3885) Cortegaça - Rua da Floresta
description: Very little traveled area surrounded by trees and tables. We have stopped to eat here and have had no problems.

title: (4500) Espinho - 793 Rua do Quartel
description: Large car park near the beach at the exit of Espinho. There are other motorhomes sleeping there, market every Monday in Espinho. No service. Free and lighted. Not very clean and noisy.

name: Parque de Campismo de Cortegaça
title: (3885) Parque de Campismo de Cortegaça
description: Campismo de Cortegaça by the sea. Quiet, good reception, sanitary facilities are dilapidated but clean.

address.street: Rua do Clube de Campismo Os Nortenhos

title: (4500) Espinho - 94 Viela do Figueiredo
description: Very large parking lot very clean parking on asphalt. No service, parking sheltered from the wind

title: (3885-718) - Avenida da Nato
description: Under the pines

title: (3885-718) Cortegaça - Unnamed Road
description: Parking next to a gravel road. Sometimes a bit irregular, but at night you are most of the time alone, to be able to hold on well. The aerial distance is 50 m to the water. The surf spot is good too and many locals from Porto / surroundings have come here to surf. Comparatively little for such a beautiful place.

title: (4500-639) Silvalde - 197 Rua do Novo
description: Large parking, tennis and sports center, quiet, lit at night

title: (4500-801) Espinho - 582 Rua 43
description: New Lidl car park well lit

title: (3885-718) Cortegaça - Avenida da Nato
description: Just a bit further in than the parking. Accessible only to 4x4 vehicles. Perfect quiet spot overlooking the beach. I wish I had a 4x4 and spent the night here.

title: (3885-718) - Avenida da Nato
description: Quiet place in the pine forest near a small, very accessible dirt road. 4g network, beach and surf spot at the end of the path. Possibility of going to the end of the path to have a view of the ocean, but a little too humid for the night with the ocean air.

title: (4500) Espinho - 1242-1408 Rua 14
description: Parking next to the sea, 10 minutes from the city, shops, casino. A little noise because the train passes 2, 3 times in the night.

title: (4500) Espinho - Rua 37
description: Today Monday market day, parking in the heart of the market, this car park is for everyone, very convenient to go this walk. The market and open from 7h to 18h. We arrived this morning at 7:45 we were about twenty vehicles park. Beware of the pill pocket at the market .. Photos taken from the CC with the entrance to the parking lot, and the second with the guardian.

title: (4500-191) Espinho - 937 Rua 35
description: A dead end street with about 20 parking spaces. Residential houses and a school are right on this street. Overall, we had a safe night and recommend this place. no extras A country road is less than 5 meters from the parking lot, so it's a bit louder. Attended school according to weekdays.

title: (3885) Arada - 154 Rua dos Moinhos
description: Excellent picnic area with waste bin and chemical toilet. clean and quiet. Very small space to park on a steep hill. Levellers won't be enough to solve the problem.

title: (4500-345) Espinho - 1127 Rua 2
description: Free. 10m from restaurant 20 from the beach. car park and cc 6 to 7m. beautiful ocean view. not too easy to access. cause works in the city.

title: (3885-718) Maceda - Avenida da Nato
description: Parking to access a supervised beach in the middle of the pine forest. Possibility of surfing. Be careful, however, because the view can be hidden by large white machines that cluster against the barrier.

title: (4500-054) Anta - 1092 Rua 19
description: Laundry Selfservice

title: (3885-718) Maceda - Avenida da Nato
description: A beautiful place overlooking the sea and / or the green with forest. You are completely quiet and alone, because it is not an official place. You have to slalom through the trees, but it's worth it!!! There is therefore no waste disposal or sanitary facilities. Just wonderfully pure nature!

title: () Maceda -
description: Coins superb, no service in the woods, overlooking the ocean, a flat location was already taken, so we went up a bit in the woods. It took us some calles, very quiet night, rocked by the ocean

name: Camping municipal de Espinho
title: (4500-910) Camping municipal de Espinho
description: Espinho Municipal Campsite. Town 10/min walk and the beach 700 m if you take it under the railway line, otherwise you have to walk 1.5 km to the beach, under surveillance, possibility of fishing at sea, and a big market on Mondays. Very easy to get to Porto by train, with a train every 30 min. Very nice campsite staff and speak French, with shower, swimming pool, electricity, we had a very good week

title: (4410-151) São Félix da Marinha - 267 Rua dos Limites
title_short: (4410-151) São Félix da Marinha - 267 Rua dos Limites
description: Self-service laundry from 8 a.m. to 9 p.m.

title: (4410-151) Espinho - 12 Rua dos Limites
description: Very good for staying overnight without service

title: (3885) Maceda - Unnamed Road
description: A really nice and quiet parking space right on the cliff. There are other places nearby, but this one is a bit hidden and isolated behind a curve. The driveway up to then is quite bumpy and the curve is even more exciting. 4x4 certainly makes things easier, as the ground is quite sandy, but our t4 Bulli mastered it with flying colors. We felt very safe and yet free. 10 minutes away is an intermarche (supermarket) with a water point for mobile homes. There is no direct access to the beach, but there is a great view of the sea. A few minutes north is an official PP with beach access.

title: (4535) Mozelos - 114 Rua Santa Luzia
description: Perfect for spending a night.

title: (3885) Maceda - Unnamed Road
description: Great trail from the road follow path on the left hand side you may get down a fair way in a van but don’t risk getting stuck in the soft sand any 4x4 is perfect we camped on the side where the tall trees are in Hammocks but plenty of room to set up

title: (3885) Arada - 109LR N109
description: Gas Refil at TUTI (Cuco Autogas). Big gas deal GLP/LPG gas station

title: (4520-176) Santa Maria da Feira - 8 Rua Penas
title_short: (4520-176) Santa Maria da Feira - 8 Rua Penas
description: Quiet parking near the center. Behind the Continente supermarket that has washing and drying machines. There is a fountain nearby. It does not have a parking meter and you can walk to visit the city. We spent two quiet nights.

title: (4520-224) Santa Maria da Feira - 5 Rua Arlindo de Sousa
title_short: (4520-224) Santa Maria da Feira - 5 Rua Arlindo de Sousa
description: Free parking (day & night) in front of the "Armazém do caffè" café. Not very far from the city center and the castle. There is a shopping center also a 7 minute walk away (CONTINENT). We slept 3 nights in this car park, it's quite safe (security level) but on the other hand there is a lot of car traffic at night (until around midnight) and sometimes a dog who walks alone and barks (but it doesn't last long). But the place is good because "safe" . There is also a sorting location in the parking lot, to empty the various waste (glass, plastic, paper and incinerables). Unfortunately I didn't think about taking a photo when we were there.

title: (4520-161) Santa Maria da Feira - 91 Rua Comendador Sá Couto
title_short: (4520-161) Santa Maria da Feira - 91 Rua Comendador Sá Couto
description: Fountain with drinking water, right next to the "CONTINENTE" shopping center and other shops. There are therefore several parking spaces, electricity in the shopping center, toilets and wifi.

title: (4410-178) São Félix da Marinha - 35 Rua Loureiros
title_short: (4410-178) São Félix da Marinha - 35 Rua Loureiros
description: 3 large blue areas mark this motorhome site. We stayed here for 1 night, alone. A lot of traffic noise, but if you are not bothered by it, this is a great place. Well in full sun. 1.1 km from train station. Train goes directly to Sao pento, the terminal station in the center of Porto

title: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 175 Rua Luis de Camões
title_short: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 175 Rua Luis de Camões
description:
Laundromat
hours 7 a.m. / 11 p.m.

title: (4520-161) Santa Maria da Feira - 34 Avenida 25 de Abril
title_short: (4520-161) Santa Maria da Feira - 34 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Parking 1 km from the Christmas village of Perlim (Portugal). Very spacious, you can spend the night, there are no services. There is a petrol station next to the parking lot. Ideal to go to see the town and sleep. Too quiet. Parking is hard ground.

title: (4410-141) São Félix da Marinha - 120 Rua Moínho de Vento
title_short: (4410-141) São Félix da Marinha - 120 Rua Moínho de Vento
description: Small open space at the end of a cul-de-sac. Access via dirt road easily possible. Relatively beautiful view of the sea and the small stream, very quiet. Space for 4-5 campers

title: (3880-728) Ovar - N109
description: Lidl parking lot with wastewater area

title: (4410-113) São Félix da Marinha - 716 Rua Estação
title_short: (4410-113) São Félix da Marinha - 716 Rua Estação
description: Laundry Selfservice

title: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 21 Largo Camões
title_short: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 21 Largo Camões
description: Free and shaded parking, right next to public wc, various cafes and a fountain (i don't know if the water is drinkable). Various monuments to visit from there (castle, church, the path of trees, etc.). The tourist office is a 3 minute walk away. There is also a children's play area just above the parking lot, with a mini-golf course. During the day for sure, but be careful at night, there are walkers.

title: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 35 Avenida Doutor Belchior Cardoso da Costa
title_short: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 35 Avenida Doutor Belchior Cardoso da Costa
description: Site for parking and overnight. Near the Castle.

address.street: 35 Avenida Doutor Belchior Cardoso da Costa

title: (4535-014) Lourosa -
description: Excellent self service laundry. To wash and dry. Clean and friendly.

title: (4520-200) Santa Maria da Feira - 54 Rua das Fogaceiras
title_short: (4520-200) Santa Maria da Feira - 54 Rua das Fogaceiras
description: Great place to stay overnight, really very quiet, the reviews about the other places in the city the common note was the noise and lack of peace, so I found this little paradise! it is in the shade of the trees by the little river. On a Saturday night I was the only one parked there. I believe it’s a good place for the weekends!

title: (4410-178) São Félix da Marinha - 2665 Avenida República
title_short: (4410-178) São Félix da Marinha - 2665 Avenida República
description: Sao Félix avenue de la République facing the sea. Tranquility and magnificent views, possibility of long walks by the sea. No service. No photos taken because arrival at night and morning rain and fog.

title: () Santa Maria da Feira -
description: Parking quiet bathrooms nearby

title: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - Alameda Roberto Vaz de Oliveira
title_short: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - Alameda Roberto Vaz de Oliveira
description: Very beautiful medieval castle to visit, 3 euros adults and 1 euro big child. Possibility to fill the water maybe not for drinking but for cooking, shower, dishes. Sorting bin. Large park on the way down to the city center with an interesting museum with a great view. Many possibilities for sleeping, 2 parking lots or dirt road behind.

title: (4520-209) Santa Maria da Feira - 28 Rua Doutor Vaz Ferreira
title_short: (4520-209) Santa Maria da Feira - 28 Rua Doutor Vaz Ferreira
description:
Quiet Location in a dead end road with a view to the at night illuminated church. No traffic in this street. Parking lane along the road. Spent a relaxed and undisturbed night. In the morning birds singing and rooster crows.

Ideal if you want to stay near but Not directly in Porto.

title: (4410) São Félix da Marinha - Granja
description: 15 km from Porto, Praia Granja, facing the ocean, parking lot along the seawall, still free spaces around 3 p.m., set down for the afternoon, saw no prohibition signs. Small vehicle only

title: () São João - N109
description:
On Lidl parking lot, 3 washing machines. You can do the laundry while shopping at Lidl.
The whole Lidl isn't on Google Maps yet, it's a very new building.

title: (3880-109) Ovar - Unnamed Road
description: Continent supermarket with tables and large parking tables with shaded passageway to stop to eat outside the car

name: Camping de Furadouro**
title: (3880-369) Camping de Furadouro**
description: Camping de Furadouro ** Open all year

title: (4410-462) Arcozelo - 2 Rua Doutor Alfredo Dias
description: Very not recommended place to spend the night, it can save you in case of need but there are better places nearby.

title: (3880) Ovar - Avenida dos Descobrimentos
description: Flat area of cobblestones and grass. Farther from the beach than the other now prohibited car park. It has bathrooms about 150 meters away. Be careful at the entrance, you have to climb a curb on a slightly lowered curb.

title: (4505) Fiães - 4505 Rua Rio Uima
description: Quiet place to sleep and to spend a day in nature, walking or biking in the natural park (passadiços de Fiães, Parque das Ribeiras). Picnic area not far away

title: (3880-354) Ovar - 501 Avenida Fernão de Magalhães
description: Laundry Iclean open everyday from 8-24. Small washing machine 4e , dryer cost 1,5e. There is machine to exchange EUR. Payment only by cash, coins. The best to exchange is max 10e.

title: (4505, Port) - 150 Avenida Parque Desportivo
description: Quiet car park with a nice view of the city, above a school (a few cars around 9 a.m.) and craft area. forest nearby, for walks.

title: (3880-350) Ovar - 580 Avenida da República
description: Quiet parking at the end of the beach. No prohibition [For the moment]

title: (4410-371) Arcozelo - 218 Rua Caminho Ribeiro
description: This is now a horse training ground, not sure if you can stay here! Quiet place and close to nature, right in the middle of Arcozelo. Open to everyone 24h

title: (4505) Caldas de São Jorge - 73 Rua Dona Graciete Santos
title_short: (4505) Caldas de São Jorge - 73 Rua Dona Graciete Santos
description: These are thermal baths accessible to all with very pleasant water.

title: (4410-413) Arcozelo - 10 Praceta Gomes Guerra
description: Dead end in a quiet residential area. we stayed here for one night during the week without a hitch. possibility for imposing motorhome. 2 to 3 locations maximum. a little opposite with the surrounding accommodation but at the end of August a lot of unoccupied residences.

title: (3880-282) Ovar - 24 Travessa João das Bichas
description: Public drinking fountain

title: (3880-067) Ovar - 165 Rua Doutor João Semana
description: Place where you can stay during carnaval day and night

title: (4520) Souto - 279 Rua Fonte do Amieiro
description: Beautiful place to eat, have a snack... (8 wooden tables with their benches) very narrow path and small parking lot.

title: (4410-406) Arcozelo - 901 Avenida João Paulo II
description: Quiet place next to a park with the possibility of picnics. Further down, there is a pedestrian path that leads to the Miramar beach. Nice.

title: (4505) Salgueiral - 760 Rua Principal
description: Drinking water from the source with wash-house

title: (3880) Ovar - Rua Doutor Francisco Zagalo
description: Parking close the Ovar hospital. Huge area, very quiet. Easy access to Ovar town. Five km from the sea. No services but grey water disposal is possible........ Not catered for though. A short walk to a Wine Cellar and Tourist Info where one can rent a bike...for free!. Great and useful to see the surrounding s.

title: (4505) VÁRZEA - 192 Rua Várzea
description: Green space with am shadows and picnic tables, having public grills has a snack bar, has a small stream but it is not allowed to swim too much, very quiet to spend the day just picnic with grills, with coffee and bath rooms, ideal for a stroll pedestrian, has a small stream but can take baths.

title: (3880) Ovar - 1599 Rua Família Colares Pinto
description:
Great spot right on the waterway / lagoon
A yacht club to the left. No services. One can easily spend a night here. Easy cycling to Ovarian or and the beach.

title: () - Rua Carvalha
description: Picknick area with several places for overnight stay 24h.

title: (4505) Vale Da Cabra - 1334 Rua Principal
description: Free source drinking water

name: Praia da Azurreira - Ovar
title: (3880) Praia da Azurreira - Ovar
description: Picnic tables and possibility of parking overnight. Praia da Azurreira - Ovar.

title: (4405) Vila Nova de Gaia - 282 Alameda do Senhor da Pedra
title_short: (4405) Vila Nova de Gaia - 282 Alameda do Senhor da Pedra
description: A very quiet and nice place to park. During the day, you may also visit the beautiful chapel of “Senhor da Pedra”

title: (4405-632) Vila Nova de Gaia - 166 Rua Comandante Carvalho Araújo
title_short: (4405-632) Vila Nova de Gaia - 166 Rua Comandante Carvalho Araújo
description: Level parking with large spaces in the center of it. Good access. Next to park and restoration. Showers on the beach, at least in the summer season. We have had a quiet night.

title: (4405-630) Lagos - 218 Travessa Capitão Carrilho
description: Parking near the beach. No height limit. Quiet to spend a night and go to the beach.

title: (3700-414) Arrifana - Rua Aliança Futebol Club
description:
Laundry facilities outside the Intermarche and another one inside.
4 EUR washing, 2 EUR dryer 20min.
"Cheap" fuel, in relation.

title: (4415-135) Pedroso - 6 Rua Nova da Raposa
description: LPG petrol station. We had our French propane bottle refilled with LPG without worries, the person who served us had an adapter.

title: (3700-315) São João da Madeira - 841 Avenida Engenheiro Arantes e Oliveira
title_short: (3700-315) São João da Madeira - 841 Avenida Engenheiro Arantes e Oliveira
description: Public parking lot without access control and security guard, but is illuminated during the night and very quiet. On the main street near to the place there are some services like bakery, cafeteria, ATM and the Municipal Market.

title: (3880) Ovar - 1089 Rua Família Colares Pinto
description: Magnificent shaded area next to the arm of the sea with a small beach, children playground and parking space. We came there just passing through in the middle of August and there was no one there. I don't know if we can spend the night there but I think the setting is quite possible because there is a path right next to the picnic tables. Road not far.

title: (3700) - 211 Rua Casa da Mâmoa
description: Large car park. We were able to park in the back of the parking lot, further from the road. We saw no bans for the night. Relatively flat parking lot, flatter and larger than the one a little lower down.

title: (3880) Válega - 653 Rua Júlio Dinis
description: School bus parking as there is an old abandoned school next door. Perfect for large camping cars. Shady and straight parking lot. Very quiet.

title: () - 1145 Rua do Mouquinho
description: Very large parking lot between the forest and the stadium of Sao Martinho da Gandara. Absolute calm, stabilized soil and easy to access. Ideal for a night stopover or picnic. Village center within walking distance ... No service.

title: (3700-739) Mâmoa - 166 Rua Campo de Tiro
description: Flat parking of an artificial beach area, quiet at night. small walks nearby and fountain very convenient to recharge water for free. I spent a quiet night there. 4 places for online motorhomes and 15 places for fitted vans.

title: (3880) Válega - 179 Rua dos Combatentes do Ultramar
title_short: (3880) Válega - 179 Rua dos Combatentes do Ultramar
description: Service area with the possibility of filling the water

title: (3880) Válega - 501 Rua do Gac
description: Safe and quiet place to visit the church of Valega. We spent the night without problems. The church is superb for its azulejos ... A must for art lovers. There are public toilets very close to the car park almost opposite a Tien21 store. Bakery and bars very close.

title: (3720) Teso - 408 Rua do Clube Desportivo de Cucujães
title_short: (3720) Teso - 408 Rua do Clube Desportivo de Cucujães
description: Laundry Self-service.

address.street: 408 Rua do Clube Desportivo de Cucujães

title: (3720) - 419 Rua da Abolembra
description: Security place to sleep

title: (3880) Válega - 149 Rua da Igreja Matriz
description: Parking lot at cemetery next to Igreja Martiz Santa Maria in Válega. View from the camper on the beautiful Azejulos. Toilet next to the church. Panasaria on the square nearby.

title: (4405) Valadares - 96 Rua Loubet Bravo
description: Small hidden parking lot. Directly on the beach, somewhat sheltered from the wind but very nice. Unattended and rocky beach at low tide. I preferred this quiet location to other noisy car parks. The square is passable from two sides. From the "right" side it is super passable from the "left" side, but only with good four-wheel drive because there is a lot of deep sand here. Nevertheless, many campers find a place right by the sea.

title: (4405-856) Vilar do Paraíso - 90 Travessa Azenha
description:
Only parking. No services. Very quiet with green zone near to walk.
Picnic tables available.

title: (4405-853) Vila Nova de Gaia - 139 Rua Conselheiro Fonseca
title_short: (4405-853) Vila Nova de Gaia - 139 Rua Conselheiro Fonseca
description: Wash house

title: (3880) Ovar -
description: Good spot close to the sea but without direct view. Be careful during mosquito season. Anglers who leave late and arrive from 6.30am.

title: (3880) Válega - Rua Nossa Senhora de Entreáguas
title_short: (3880) Válega - Rua Nossa Senhora de Entreáguas
description: Barbecues

title: (4405-738) Vila Nova de Gaia - 64 Rua Dos Combatentes
title_short: (4405-738) Vila Nova de Gaia - 64 Rua Dos Combatentes
description: Beach parking, under the main road axis, quiet, top to spend the night, 20 minutes from the center of Porto by car / truck .. Next to '' Vibraçōes Bar ''

title: (4415) Crestuma - 81 Estrada Penedo
description: Parking bay directly on the Douro river. It is not an official car park but as the road ends at a cafe/restaurant/kayak rental there is no traffic other than guests. Space for 2-3 cars. We had a quiet night and woke up to a beautiful river view. ☀️

title: (4515-649) Foz do Sousa - 120 Rua Beira Rio
title_short: (4515-649) Foz do Sousa - 120 Rua Beira Rio
description: The descent is very difficult!!!!! vehicles more than 5 mt. mission Impossible. the output is even worse!!!!! experienced drivers only!!!!

title: (4430) Avintes - 37 Rua Marco do Cardal
description: On the back of Lidl, we spent one night . You can use the free wifi from the supermarket. there are many good spots around Lidl.

title: (4415-694) Olival - 80 Largo São Mateus
description:
Right next to Café Sá, in the pretty village of Arnelas, public toilets and showers, at least open during the day. Possible hot water in the showers (not tested).

Garbage cans and parking nearby.

title: () Avanca - Rua do Mourão
description: Quiet area, next to a river, in a leisure park.

title: (4415-616) Crestuma - 16 Rua Fontinha
description: A beautiful place to be at night.  A place with a lot of movement for the summer, in the spring a little movement and in the winter very quiet.  In winter a small cafe is open and the Marquês das Francesinhas only opens a few hours during the day.  Very quiet place in winter.

title: (4430) Vila Nova de Gaia - 280 Rua Laborim
title_short: (4430) Vila Nova de Gaia - 280 Rua Laborim
description: Natural water point (wash house), ideal for washing clothes and / or filling jerrican.

title: (3860) Pardilhó -
description:
Small flat esplanade at the end of the road, for one or two motorhomes. view of the surrounding marshes and the estuary and the villages in the distance.

peaceful place.

On the road to access the spot, there are walking signs to do.

name: Istas Garden
title: (4405-519) Istas Garden
description: Camping Istas Garden, small familiar and relaxing camping, 2 kms from the beach and 8 kms from Oporto. All the pitches have access to (included) water, eletricity, barbecue area, fully equiped kitchen, living room and an indoor heated salted pool

title: (4405-736) Vila Nova de Gaia - R do Cerro
title_short: (4405-736) Vila Nova de Gaia - R do Cerro
description: Campismo da Madalena campsite. It is closed but you can park in its parking lot.

title: (4430-812) Avintes - 176 Rua Cunha
description: RV park in Gaia Biological Park. 9 separate pitches in a very beautiful green, peaceful and quiet environment. electricity and sewerage. Ideal for visiting Porto. Direct buses to the center of Porto. One of the most beautiful parks. This price includes the visit to the biological park (animals, eagles, storks, deer, bison,...). Only for motorhomes with toilet/shower on board. Arrivals are only possible during the opening hours of the Park Biologico. 9am-7pm

title: (4405-735) Vila Nova de Gaia - 14 Rua Canide
title_short: (4405-735) Vila Nova de Gaia - 14 Rua Canide
description: Small corner 50m from the beach quiet a little wind anyway

name: Parque de Campismo Marisol
title: (4405-717) Parque de Campismo Marisol
description: Campsite Marisol. the caretaker speaks French, unpretentious campsite but open all year round

title: (4415) Crestuma - Rua Fontinha
description: Free parking with a good view to the dam.

title: (4515) Foz do Sousa - 3715 Avenida Francisco Sá Carneiro
title_short: (4515) Foz do Sousa - 3715 Avenida Francisco Sá Carneiro
description:
Shady parking spot near the Douro River.

There's a bar upstairs and some granit tables. Relatively flat area. Calm except for the road and some fishermen.

title: (4400-382) Vila Nova de Gaia - 2780 Avenida da Beira-Mar
title_short: (4400-382) Vila Nova de Gaia - 2780 Avenida da Beira-Mar
description: Water tap, at the level of an access to a restaurant and to the beach. Perfect for filling water barrels.

title: (4400-413) Vila Nova de Gaia - 363 Rua João Paulo II
title_short: (4400-413) Vila Nova de Gaia - 363 Rua João Paulo II
description: Parking by the way simple and comfortable

title: (4405-034) Vila Nova de Gaia - 128 Rua Maurício Lourenço de Oliveira
title_short: (4405-034) Vila Nova de Gaia - 128 Rua Maurício Lourenço de Oliveira
description: On street parking. Slept safe for one night. Noisy from the road, but useful for visiting the garage in the morning. Bus nearby to get into town.

title: (3860-124) Avanca - 6 Rua da Faia
description: Parking at the sports center, and several free spaces along the street. Little help on the road to Porto or Aveiro. Continente supermarket next door. Very calm night.

title: (4400-241) Vila Nova de Gaia - 310 Rua Particular de Santo António
title_short: (4400-241) Vila Nova de Gaia - 310 Rua Particular de Santo António
description: Parking behind the department store. convenient parking a short distance behind the Gaiashopping department store.  evening and morning traffic due to supply, but otherwise a good place with access to shopping and public transport to get to the center.

title: (4400-353) Vila Nova de Gaia - 90 Rua Agro de Cima
title_short: (4400-353) Vila Nova de Gaia - 90 Rua Agro de Cima
description: Parking along the beach suitable for vans - very busy at night! It's quieter after 2 a.m. m. Accessible beach shower, public toilet from 9:30 am. m. Supermarket for breakfast on site.

title: (4400-382) Vila Nova de Gaia - 2263 Avenida da Beira-Mar
title_short: (4400-382) Vila Nova de Gaia - 2263 Avenida da Beira-Mar
description: An ordinary parking lot on the beach next to a supermarket for a fresh breakfast and on the beach there are public toilets and showers. We have been there for 2 nights without any problems with a lot of other campers. We felt safe because we were there with so many of course. Fortunately, we did not suffer from burglary / window damage in this place, as you can read in almost all other places here on the app. If you face the beach and walk to the right, you will come across a bus stop for line 15 (it is nowhere but it stops there on the road) that goes to the famous bridge.

title: (3860-544) Pardilhó - 65 Rua Joaquim Maria de Resende
title_short: (3860-544) Pardilhó - 65 Rua Joaquim Maria de Resende
description: The service area along the estuary with a port and its ramp has a playground. To use electricity, water and drain ask for the key by calling the number on the control panel. Relatively calm because many passing cars are looking for narcotics

title: (4404-503) Vila Nova de Gaia -
description: Perfect for spending the night, it also has 5ghz wifi from the continent, you have to get close to your establishment for a better connection.

title: (4415) Lever - Vereda do Laboratório
description: Disused quay next to the dam

title: (4400-103) Vila Nova de Gaia - 66 Avenida dos Descobrimentos
title_short: (4400-103) Vila Nova de Gaia - 66 Avenida dos Descobrimentos
description: Parking at LIDL and near a Leroy Merlin and a Makro.

title: (4430-769) Avintes - 60 Rua Azenha
description:
A park next to the beach, you can spend a few hours. 
It has a bar near the beach if you need toilets or drinks.

title: (4430-207) Vila Nova de Gaia - 2155 Avenida da República
title_short: (4430-207) Vila Nova de Gaia - 2155 Avenida da República
description:
Free parking 10min by metro from the center of Porto. Ideal for visiting the city!
We arrived around 8am to be sure to have room!

title: (4430-300) Vila Nova de Gaia -
description: Somewhat secluded large parking lot at the stadium, with Uber for 5€ to the centre, open 7 a.m. to 8 p.m.

title: (4400-382) Vila Nova de Gaia - 2020 Avenida da Beira-Mar
title_short: (4400-382) Vila Nova de Gaia - 2020 Avenida da Beira-Mar
description: A good emergency parking space for smaller vans. Due to the time, we didn't get a place on a campsite and we didn't feel safe in the suburbs. We were able to stand here the night without any worries and didn't attract attention with the closed pop-up roof. A shower can be found across the street. This is right on the beach.

name: Parque Campismo Salgueiros
title: (4400-397) Parque Campismo Salgueiros
description:
Minimum stay 2 nights. Check in first, then wait for someone to take you to the pitch. It says that you can only use a minimal amount of electricity, otherwise everything will collapse (2A). Plumbing is old but clean. An option to stay in town for a visit. Bus 300m away, line 15, direct access to the center of Porto. WiFi at the reception.
Currently only after prior reservation by email.

title: (4510-036) Jovim - Av. Beira Rio
description: Place to park 1 or 2 trucks or motorhomes (but not too big). We preferred this place to the other side as peaceful at night and not frequented by young people at night. Just 1 fisherman or 2. We spent a quiet night without noise, apart from the usual barking of Portuguese dogs from time to time (you will have to explain to me why in this country we hear dogs barking every night everywhere where we go !!)

title: (4510-001) Jovim - 1779 Rua da Aldeia
description: A quiet stop on the Douro.  A small passage on this little road as there is direct access to a small beach. Small snack, ice cream. No service. Forbidden to stay overnight.

title: (4400-232) Vila Nova de Gaia - 305 Rua Nova do Fojo
title_short: (4400-232) Vila Nova de Gaia - 305 Rua Nova do Fojo
description: At the Auchan gas station there is water to fill the motorhome for free, nearby is Mercadona and Alcampo

title: (4430-685) Vila Nova de Gaia - 15 Vereda da Fontinha
title_short: (4430-685) Vila Nova de Gaia - 15 Vereda da Fontinha
description: Parking next to the Mercadona in Vila Nova de Gaia, 30 minutes walk to the Luis I bridge, or you can take the metro in 5 minutes. Very quiet place and seems safe.

title: (4510-113) Jovim - 548 Rua dos Praia
description: A place where you can park and walk until the little beach near the acess and enjoy  a quiet day.

title: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 1007 Rua de Raimundo de Carvalho
title_short: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 1007 Rua de Raimundo de Carvalho
description: Clean, well-kept laundry with 3 washing machines and 3 dryers. Ironing service is also provided, but laundry is self-service. Coin exchange machine available. You cannot park there with the camper, but you can park at the nearest P on P4N and then a 4-minute walk.

title: (4400-037) Vila Nova de Gaia - 72 Rua Senhor de Matosinhos
title_short: (4400-037) Vila Nova de Gaia - 72 Rua Senhor de Matosinhos
description: Big parking surrounded by buildings. We slept super good at night here.

name: ORBITUR Canidelo
title: (4400-382) ORBITUR Canidelo
description: Canidelo campsite. Pleasant campsite with excellent facilities. Spacious and clean toilets. Big pool. Please note that the poorly delimited pitches can be narrow if there is a large presence of motorhomes. Convenient, the bus stop for Porto is a 3-minute walk away. 1 bus every 1/4 hour until midnight.

title: (4515-027) Covelo - 89 Rua Combatente Rolando Santos Pinto
title_short: (4515-027) Covelo - 89 Rua Combatente Rolando Santos Pinto
description: Park near Douro river

title: (4515-027) Covelo - 719 N108
description: In front of the Douro river. Beautiful view. Parking only. No services Bar and Marina next door. Safe place.

title: (3720) Oliveira de Azeméis - 122 Rua Doutor Manuel Brandão
title_short: (3720) Oliveira de Azeméis - 122 Rua Doutor Manuel Brandão
description: washing machine internet cafe

title: (4400-322) Canidelo - 946 Rua Tenente Valadim
description:
Automatic Laundry and dryer
Machine up to 19kg Open 8h-23h

title: (4515) Covelo - Praceta Gastão Fernandes Guedes
description: Parking possible at the marina, attention to cantilever    slope, we arrived at night, certainly little room in the day, noisy cafe with lots of cars on weekends

title: (4515) Covelo - 833-865 Rua Combatente Rolando Santos Pinto
title_short: (4515) Covelo - 833-865 Rua Combatente Rolando Santos Pinto
description: Park  near Douro river to rest

title: (4400-514) Vila Nova de Gaia - 171 Rua Nova de Alvites
title_short: (4400-514) Vila Nova de Gaia - 171 Rua Nova de Alvites
description: Self-service laundry.

title: (4400-514) Vila Nova de Gaia - 231 Rua Nova de Alvites
title_short: (4400-514) Vila Nova de Gaia - 231 Rua Nova de Alvites
description: Lidl parking lot with partial roofing. WiFi and toilet during opening hours. Feels safe with cameras, we heard about broken windows on a few other spots.

title: (4400-017) Vila Nova de Gaia - 61 Travessa Conselheiro Veloso da Cruz
title_short: (4400-017) Vila Nova de Gaia - 61 Travessa Conselheiro Veloso da Cruz
description: Launderette

title: (3720) Oliveira de Azeméis - 71 Rua Dom Manuel Correia Bastos Pina
title_short: (3720) Oliveira de Azeméis - 71 Rua Dom Manuel Correia Bastos Pina
description: ASA - Motorhomes Address Parque la Salette, Oliveira de Azeméis Picnic facilities (picnic park) Municipal swimming pools Sanctuary Category Municipal ASA Location Aveiro (District). Free electricity.

address.street: 71 Rua Dom Manuel Correia Bastos Pina

title: (4430) Avintes - 446 Rua Areinho
description: Close to town, dirt parking. Good for a night out. Close to the river.

title: (4430) Avintes - 3 Rua Esteiro
description: Place at the edge of the water ideal for motorhome of 7m40 and very calm while being lulled by the noise of the ocean. Narrow but very good, 10min from downtown and small restaurant 200m with very good country cuisine and very welcoming staff despite the language barrier.

title: (4400-493) Canidelo - 907 Rua Estamparia de Lavadores
description: Quiet place close to two supermarkets, laundry, post office, health station and cafes.

title: (4430) Avintes - 704 Rua Areinho
description: We had spent a first night on the pier a little higher. For our 2nd night we went down to the beach. You will find barbecue, table, clean public toilets, beach shower... the place stays clean. Despite a large attendance by residents on August 15, we were able to sleep there calmly.

title: (4430-767) Avintes - 846 Rua Areinho
description: Public beach shower next to a bathing beach, BBQ stations and a small soccer field. Great Portuguese snack bar with pool table and outdoor area 200m up the road.

name: ✻ PINE TREE FARM
title: (3860-461) ✻ PINE TREE FARM
description:
Stay on request :)
Check-in 1:00 p.m. - 10:00 p.m. | Departure 8:00 a.m. - 11:00 a.m.

✺ Private location in Pardilhó with 4,000 m2 of green area with farm animals, vegetable and fruit plantation, large umbrella pines to rest in the shade, playground and a large dining porch for relax in a family and friendly environment.

✺ Other facilities and services available:
· Private bathroom with hot shower
laundry service
Basket of fruits and vegetables (house)
Containers for organic food and recycling
Personalized itinerary of nearby places to visit

✺ Lessons/Experiences:
⛵️ Catamaran ride
· Bird watching in the Aveiro Lagoon
Fishing in São Jacinto
Kayak rental (great opportunity to see wild flamingos at sunset)

✺ Nearby:
Torreira Beach
Train station in Aveiro, Porto, Coimbra or Lisbon (6km)
· Walking and cycling paths on the shore of the Aveiro Lagoon
· 40-minute cycle path to the coast - Torreira Beach
· Fishing spots
· Kitesurfing and windsurfing (10min by car)
Climbing in Arouca (1h drive)
⛵️ Museums

Maximum limits: Length 7m | Width 2.3m
Caravan or car + house not allowed

title: (4430-867) Avintes - 86 Rua Paço
description: It's next to the road. It's not on the ground next door because we could not get in because of the puddles. Next to Del Río, an avenue. Very calm. A little noise if cars pass quickly.

title: (4430-069) Vila Nova de Gaia - 347 Rua Quinta Pedras
title_short: (4430-069) Vila Nova de Gaia - 347 Rua Quinta Pedras
description: Found by chance in Vila Nova de Gaia, this paid parking on the street or in your own car park is located in a quiet area less than 15' on foot from the famous Dom Luis bridge or the Porto cellars. We left our motorhome there for 6 hours without worries. €2.60 for 4 hours to be paid on your mobile, possibility of extending remotely. In short, a good plan to easily access this part of Porto.

title: (4515) Covelo - 9 Praceta Santa Isabel
description: Parking around a large paved square. Possibility to spend the night in peace on the back, away from the road. Step to start the Douro Valley. No service except for a few small trash cans around the square.

title: (4515) Lomba - 41 N222
description: WATER POINT-tap with water next to the park of Merendas, at the viewpoint.

title: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - 239 Rua Vistosa
title_short: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - 239 Rua Vistosa
description: Park lot day and night free of charge.

title: (4400-141) Vila Nova de Gaia - 188 Rua Fernandes dos Anjos
title_short: (4400-141) Vila Nova de Gaia - 188 Rua Fernandes dos Anjos
description: Automatic laundry. The owner is on site. He speaks French and English. He is very friendly and will help you understand how it works. Washing machine, Dryer. Reading and coffee machine on site. WiFi available too.

title: (4515-162) Foz do Sousa - 102 Rua da Escola Velha
title_short: (4515-162) Foz do Sousa - 102 Rua da Escola Velha
description: Good local. Very good!

title: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - 30C4 Rua Dona Leonor de Freitas
title_short: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - 30C4 Rua Dona Leonor de Freitas
description: Huge free parking lot no facilities but with asphalt and flat

title: (4515) Foz do Sousa - 750 Rua das Águas
title_short: (4515) Foz do Sousa - 750 Rua das Águas
description: Small picnic area at the edge of De Sousa River. We heard no one during the night and no one came before 10am. Only 15-20 minutes from the center of Porto it is very convenient. Possibility to swim in the river. Attention arrive well by the Ruas das Aguas because the gps can make come by a dirt road at the exit of the A43.

title: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia -
description: Level parking with light and views of the city nearby homes

title: (4515-345) Medas - 472 Avenida Central de Broalhos
description: Self-service laundromat 24/24

name: Campidouro
title: (4515) Campidouro
description: Very pleasant and quiet campsite for this period (September) with a breathtaking view of the Douro. Very large swimming pool with a snack bar. Space for children. No shops nearby. 25kms from Porto. Well shaded place. Clean sanitary facilities.

title: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 35 Rua Jau
title_short: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 35 Rua Jau
description: We found this small parking by chance in a dead end, on the edge of zone 1, the cheapest. Pitch only for vehicle not too long and easily manoeuvrable. Douro River, bridge to the city center and Porto cellars, accessible in 15-20 minutes on foot. Maximum duration of 4 hours renewable, but possibility of doing it remotely with an easy-to-use application (real bargain!). Stayed the day and early evening, no security concerns about us.

title: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 72 Rua Luís de Camões
title_short: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 72 Rua Luís de Camões
description: Parking of the General Torres railway station. Just to leave ac during the day.

title: (4420) Valbom - 119 Rua Clube Naval Infante Dom Henrique
title_short: (4420) Valbom - 119 Rua Clube Naval Infante Dom Henrique
description: Safe place. Next to a park with a children's area (toys, zip line, climbing). Near the Douro River (river beach and promenade), bar and bathroom.

address.street: 119 Rua Clube Naval Infante Dom Henrique

title: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 35-159 Rua Fervença
title_short: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 35-159 Rua Fervença
description: Warnung- only for small vans! Very narrow streets! Great parking lot to explore Porto. felt safe and slept well as it got surprisingly quiet after midnight! Small camper is a must - still tight but were perfectly instructed by the park attendant!

title: (4515) Pé de Moura - 267 Largo da República
title_short: (4515) Pé de Moura - 267 Largo da República
description: Very quiet, on the banks of the Douro River (World Heritage of Humanity), without services. Possibility of water nearby. WiFi coffee Tretas. WC and playground. Leveled, no shadows. Small vehicles only.

title: (4540) - 1889 N326
description: Picnic area and views of the mountains. Possibility to go online for motorhomes, 2 places. Only for the day and a short break, the land seems to be of the church.

title: (4430) Vila Nova de Gaia - 40 Travessa de Sá
title_short: (4430) Vila Nova de Gaia - 40 Travessa de Sá
description: Fountain with drinking water

title: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - Avenida da Beira-Mar
title_short: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - Avenida da Beira-Mar
description: Very nice place...awesome

title: (4400-161) Vila Nova de Gaia - 710 Avenida de Ramos Pinto
title_short: (4400-161) Vila Nova de Gaia - 710 Avenida de Ramos Pinto
description: Parking to enjoy the city rather well placed. Bike path very close and bridge to cross the Douro too. Open 24 hours, we parked there for a short day to visit Porto. Rather good price level and considering the comments of the free parking lots (broken window car). 2m20/2m30 with roof terrace parking for trucks. Exit a little narrow, it goes well with a van, bigger I'm not sure. No payment by credit card.

title: (4400-438) Vila Nova de Gaia - 297 Avenida Professor Orlando Ribeiro
title_short: (4400-438) Vila Nova de Gaia - 297 Avenida Professor Orlando Ribeiro
description:
Great laundry facility with a plug for charging and wifi while you wait. Attendant was very helpful and spoke good English.

2 x 9kg and 1 x 19kg washers done in 35min
3 x 19kg dryers on 17min cycle

title: (4430-175) Vila Nova de Gaia - 50 Rua Cândido dos Reis
title_short: (4430-175) Vila Nova de Gaia - 50 Rua Cândido dos Reis
description: Laundromat Sabao Rosa

title: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - Afurada
description: Huge parking lot. Sea view on one side and Porto on the other. Overnight stay prohibited.

title: (4400-517) Vila Nova de Gaia -
description: Motorhome pitch in the parking lot of the Gaïa Jardin shopping center, there is a pharmacy, washing machine, supermarket, fast food, and car maintenance store. Huge car park under video surveillance. Be careful, however, of the barriers at night, which makes it very quiet. Two possible entries, one with height limit and the other not.

title: (4400-667) Vila Nova de Gaia - 3421 Rua Jordão
title_short: (4400-667) Vila Nova de Gaia - 3421 Rua Jordão
description: Gas station with free air and water

title: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 9 Rua 1
description: This is free parking near the river. Good for parking and staying 1 night. No service but close to the bridge to Porto.

title: (3870-304) Torreira - Unnamed Road
description: Local beach access parking in the dunes. Access via bumpy dirt track. You can reach the parking area without 4x4, I suppose. There are more tracks starting from there and leading through the dunes along the coast. They're built on deeper sand though, so you need 4x4 if you want to take those.

title: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - R. da Praia
title_short: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - R. da Praia
description: Busy place day and night. but good view in front of Douro river don't have shower toilet or any other facilities.

title: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 1 Rua 1
description: Good parking with a view, I do not know for overnight stay, just over the main street, very empty, city is within a few minutes walk.

title: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - Rua da Praia
title_short: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - Rua da Praia
description: Free parking along the river, spots on the road and a small parking area on the river. Free parking, parked here day and night with no issues, asked a local security guard and he said it was no problem to park here. Can get busy at night if they have a show down at the river. Otherwise fine. No services.

title: (4400) São Pedro da Afurada - 1168 Alameda Jardins da Arrábida
title_short: (4400) São Pedro da Afurada - 1168 Alameda Jardins da Arrábida
description: Large parking a little far from the center but very quiet. A good alternative to parking on the river where there are many people and a lot of retirees who do not support the sound after 19 h 30.

title: (4430-316) Vila Nova de Gaia - Marginal Areinho
title_short: (4430-316) Vila Nova de Gaia - Marginal Areinho
description:
Large parking lot with bar, toilet and shower (on the beach) and quiet. A few fishermen and hikers. View of the Douro.
It is better to approach with large motorhomes via Torre Bella east of the A4!

title: (4000-509) Porto -
description: Drinking water, right next to the road, almost under the bridge

title: (4300-385) Porto - Av. Gustavo Eiffel
description: Parking space under the trees and near the gas station. Along the Douro River

title: (4300-059) Porto - Av. Gustavo Eiffel
description: Parking at the curb, directly on the edge of the Douro. Very safe because fishermen are there and there is a lot of pedestrian and car traffic.

title: (4400-087) Vila Nova de Gaia - 172 Cais do Cavaco
title_short: (4400-087) Vila Nova de Gaia - 172 Cais do Cavaco
description: Free daytime parking above the Douro. Here you can park on the shoulder of a moderately busy road, both in the sun and in the shade. Best location for walking to the center of Porto (2.5 km). The pitches are more suitable for campers or small teams.
